resources.string: To have the launcher icon displayed again, you will have to reinstall the app. Don\'t worry, you won\'t have to pay again.

Thank you for supporting us! 
 
Drop us a line at 
 hello@simplemobiletools.com, 
 we'd love to hear all your feedback and suggestions. 
 
(Please keep the app installed to avoid seeing the 'Purchase' dialog and have all app features unlocked)
